# Part 7: Psycho-Symbolic Risk Reasoning

## Nanosecond Scheduler Performance Results

### Ultra-High-Frequency Performance
- **Scheduler Created**: ✅ "risk-monitor"
- **Tick Rate**: 1,000 nanoseconds (1μs)
- **Tasks Per Second**: 11,000,000 (11M/sec)
- **Benchmark Results**: 10,000 tasks processed in 1ms
- **Average Tick Time**: 127ns
- **Performance Rating**: GOOD

### Real-Time Risk Monitoring Tasks Scheduled
1. **Portfolio Risk Matrix**: 5μs delay (critical priority)
2. **PageRank Systemic Risk**: 10μs delay (high priority)
3. **Temporal Advantage Updates**: 15μs delay (normal priority)

All tasks processed in 123ns with temporal overlap detection active.
